column1: '''Tulkastor''' was the father of [[Vairë]], an [[Elf]] of [[Tol Eressëa]], and the wife of [[Lindo]], the keeper of the [[Cottage of Lost Play]].<ref>{{LT1
column2: I}}, p. 16</ref> The [[Gnomish]] form of his name was ''Tulchathron''.<ref>{{PE
